price: Ó kúkú rí i nínú òfurufú kedere.¹
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, Ànábì Muhammad - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - fojú ara rẹ̀ rí Mọlāika Jibrīl - kí ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - nínú òfurufú kedere. Ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah an-Najm; 53:13.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
